channel.title: CVE Feed for SIGNKOREA -- SKCertService
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SIGNKOREA -- SKCertService

item.title: CVE-2018-5202|2024-08-05T05:26:47.141Z -- signkorea -- skcertservice
item.description: SKCertService 2.5.5 and earlier contains a vulnerability that could allow remote attacker to execute arbitrary code. This vulnerability exists due to the way .dll files are loaded by SKCertService. It allows an attacker to load a .dll of the attacker's choosing that could execute arbitrary code without the user's knowledge.
